sentences.english: Tragedies by handymen of death, extreme radicals, militants.
sentences.chinese: 杂工死亡的悲剧，极端激进的武装分子。

sentences.english: I am a great handyman and I love to fix almost anything.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个很好的杂工，我喜欢修理几乎所有的东西。

sentences.english: He's a handyman and an expert marskman.
sentences.chinese: 他曾做过杂工，曾是一名专业的弓手。

sentences.english: The farm employed a tractor driver and two general labourers.
sentences.chinese: 农场雇用了一名拖拉机手和两名杂工。

sentences.english: When the orderly leaves, Michael spits the pills in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 等到勤杂工离开后，Michael把药片吐在手中。

sentences.english: Hiring constrcution people, labour working, need to be harding working, immigrant or citizen preferred.
sentences.chinese: 招聘装修杂工，要能够吃苦耐劳，移民或者公民。

sentences.english: This is a type of wheel suited to home handy-man construction.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种适合家庭型车轮勤杂工建设。

sentences.english: She look down on the office girls she have work with.
sentences.chinese: 她瞧不起与她共事的女勤杂工。

sentences.english: Roy is a busboy and so is Joyce.
sentences.chinese: 罗伊是个餐馆的勤杂工，乔伊斯也是。

sentences.english: The writer worked as a busboy for one year.
sentences.chinese: 这位作家曾做过一年的餐馆勤杂工。

sentences.english: Our boss started in as an office boy .
sentences.chinese: 我们老板是从办公室勤杂工开始做起的。

sentences.english: Another one stands in front of him, holding the pill cup.
sentences.chinese: 另一个勤杂工站在他身前，拿着装有药片的纸杯。

definition: to do odd jobs/to do unskilled work
odd jobs/servant or army orderly doing odd jobs
to help with farm work/casual laborer
bitter work/hard toil/(loanword) coolie, unskilled Chinese laborer in colonial times
